评论概述: Buying again because I love so much
评论详情: Only wore 2x before I stained it. This is too good not to buy again. Great quality material— thick but soft and stretchy! The print is beautiful! I do wish there was one size larger since I have a larger chest.
This shirt has a beautiful print. It's super stretchy and very comfortable to wear. It matches great with almost everything. Super cute shirt!
The quality of this shirt's really nice. The graphic is really cute too.
